BuildWithTychiWallet.closing_statement: Start building the future with Tychi Wallet today! 1 Million Users, Plus You.

PrivacyPolicy.description: Tychi Wallet is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

Introduction.description: Welcome to TychiWallet. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal data.
example_questions: What is Tychi Wallet's approach to privacy?
Why is my privacy important to Tychi Wallet?

PersonalInformation.description: Name, email address, phone number (if provided), and identification documents for KYC/AML compliance.
example_questions: What personal information does Tychi Wallet collect?
Do I need to provide ID documents?

NonPersonalInformation.description: Device information like IP address, browser type, operating system, usage data including transaction history and interactions.
example_questions: What non-personal information does Tychi Wallet collect?
Does Tychi Wallet track my device info?

BlockchainData.description: Public blockchain addresses associated with your transactions and blockchain transaction details (which Tychi Wallet does not control).
example_questions: What blockchain data does Tychi Wallet collect?
Does Tychi Wallet control blockchain transaction data?

HowWeUseYourInformation.description: We use your data to provide and improve services, facilitate transactions, ensure legal compliance, prevent fraud, and communicate updates.
example_questions: How does Tychi Wallet use my information?
Is my data used to prevent fraud?

InformationSharingAndDisclosure.description: We do not sell personal data but may share it with service providers, regulatory authorities, or during business transfers.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet share my personal data?
Who might Tychi Wallet share my information with?

DataSecurity.description: Industry-standard security measures like encryption and access controls are implemented, but absolute security cannot be guaranteed.
example_questions: How does Tychi Wallet protect my data?
Is my information completely secure?

YourRightsAndChoices.description: You have rights to access, correct, delete your data, and opt out of marketing communications by contacting Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: How can I access or correct my data?
Can I opt out of marketing emails?

CookiesAndTrackingTechnologies.description: Tychi Wallet uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience. Cookie settings can be managed via browser.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet use cookies?
How do I manage cookie settings?

ThirdPartyLinks.description: Our services may link to third-party websites whose privacy practices are not controlled by Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet control third-party websites?
Are third-party links safe?

ChildrensPrivacy.description: Tychi Wallet does not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18 and will remove such data if discovered.
example_questions: Does Tychi Wallet collect data from children?
What happens if data from under 18 is collected?

ChangesToPrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy Policy updates will be posted on our website. Continued use of services constitutes acceptance of the changes.
example_questions: How will I know if the privacy policy changes?
What if I don't agree with changes to the privacy policy?

ContactInformation.description: For questions or concerns about the Privacy Policy, please contact Tychi Wallet.
example_questions: How can I contact Tychi Wallet about privacy concerns?
Where can I ask questions about the privacy policy?

PrivacyPolicy.closing_statement: This Privacy Policy complies with applicable laws and best practices. For full legal compliance, consult a legal expert.
